subject: Re: [LH] Kate to tour?
body:
In a message dated 6/5/07 6:46:41 AM, spielas_alan@harvard.edu writes:


Ditto Spie. I remember before TSW came out I even saw an AMERICAN TOUR SCHEDULE. If memory serves, it was supposed to open in Detroit, and the Tower Records near my house in Phoenix had a sign up for a while that said "Kate Bush tickets on sale soon..." when they really had no verification of anything. 

TT



> Kate is planning a very limited number of live appearances later this
> year / early 2008.

If I had a nickle for every time I've heard this, I'd have.... well, at
least enough for a Starbucks carmel latte machiatto.

|>oug
